text: Tityrus may refer to: * The tityrus, an ovine beast in Medieval heraldry and Greek legend * Tityrus, the father of the Amazon Helene in Greek mythology * Tityrus, the shepherd in Virgil's Eclogues, or Virgil himself * Tityrus, a pseudonym used by Edmund Spenser for Geoffrey Chaucer in The Shepheardes Calender * Tityrus the pseudonym of J.A.H. Catton, editor of the Athletic News * An alternative name for the Musimon, used in European heraldry to symbolize one in authority who leads with strength
title: Tityrus
